review: It just works. After some bad experiences with other streaming devices having flakey apps or network connectivity, I can't say enough good things about the Apple TV. True to Apple form, it just works. Take it out of the box, hook up two cables, spend 5 minutes doing some basic setup (WiFi password, etc), and boom. Netflix works beautifully, using it to watch YouTube videos is a dream, the Weather Channel app is excellent. Sky News works well. All in all, the Apple TV is what I'd recommend if you want a -simple- media box.

review: I would give this four or five stars if it was a slightly more convenient .. Every single channel on the device requires you to sign-in to your provider account on a weekly basis!!! It's absolutely absurd! I constantly have to go to a computer to verify an activation code.  It defeats the whole purpose of having the apple tv! I don't want to access my computer constantly, I would like to watch shows on the device and forget about the computer.For this reason, we are contemplating switching back to cable.. At least you have instant access to the channels you pay for and I guess we can use the apple tv for... Netflix?
